LanguageData.AIPawn_Inactive.label: Mobile AI (inactive)
LanguageData.AIPawn_Inactive.description: This mobile ai still needs a few final updates until it is ready to go.
LanguageData.AIPawn_ConstructionStation.label: Automatic AI Assembler
LanguageData.AIPawn_ConstructionStation.description: This is an automatic assembler to build ai constructs.
LanguageData.AIPawn_RechargeStation.label: Recharge Station
LanguageData.AIPawn_RechargeStation.description: A recharge station for mobile AIs
LanguageData.AIPawn_NaniteAssembler.label: Nanite Assembler
LanguageData.AIPawn_NaniteAssembler.description: An assembler that produces repair nanites. These micro robots can rebuild lost parts while a mobile AI is recharging.
LanguageData.AIPawn.description: An AI in a metal body.
LanguageData.AIPawnE.description: An enhanced AI in a metal body.
